info.name: Colored likes, full "Watched" & more
info.description:
Press to "Customize Settings" for optional settings. The style has been tested on the latest versions of Chrome and Firefox. If your style does not work: -Check the extension. -Check if the style is turned on. -Restart the browser. If it does not work after that and you decide to write a comment, please describe in detail what does not work and what browser you are using. Thank you.

Tags: youtube, 2019, watched, colored like,color icon, fix.

options.label: Custom (choose like and dislike colors below)
Box-Shadow
options.value: ytd-toggle-button-renderer.style-default-active:first-child #button.ytd-toggle-button-renderer {box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 5px var(--clr_like); border-radius: 100%;}ytd-toggle-button-renderer.style-default-active #button.ytd-toggle-button-renderer {box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 5px var(--clr_dislike); border-radius: 100%;}.ytd-comment-action-buttons-renderer:first-child #like-button.style-default-active yt-icon-button.ytd-toggle-button-renderer {box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 5px var(--clr_like); border-radius: 100%;}

options.label: Default
options.value: /* User colors for badge not set */
